    DSC & Legal
    Services

    Complete Business Registration & Licensing Solutions

    01

    Your Compliance Partner

    Running a business means navigating complex legal requirements, licenses, and registrations. Missing even one mandatory registration can lead to penalties, legal troubles, or business disruptions. We make business compliance simple and stress-free. From startup registration to industry-specific licenses, we handle all documentation, applications, and government coordinationensuring your business is fully legal, compliant, and positioned to access all available benefits and opportunities.

    02

    Our Legal & Registration Services

    Comprehensive licensing and registration solutions for all types of businesses across industries.

    MPCB License Registration

    End-to-end assistance in obtaining Maharashtra Pollution Control Board License Registration, ensuring your business complies with environmental laws and regulations. We handle documentation, application filing, and coordination with authorities for smooth approval.

    Shop Act License (Gumasta)

    Complete support for obtaining Shop Act License (Gumasta), a mandatory registration for businesses and shops in Maharashtra. We manage documentation, application submission, and follow-up to ensure timely approval and full compliance with local regulations.

    Startup Registration Certificate

    Turn your business idea into a recognized startup with official registration. We simplify the process from paperwork to approvals, helping you access tax exemptions, funding opportunities, and government support to accelerate your growth.

    Import Export Code (IEC)

    Complete assistance in obtaining IE Code, a mandatory license for international trade businesses. Our services cover documentation, application filing, and approval follow-up, ensuring smooth compliance with DGFT regulations for global business expansion.

    FSSAI Food License

    Expert help in obtaining FSSAI Food License, mandatory for all food businesses in India. We handle document preparation, application filing, and approvals to ensure full compliance with Food Safety and Standards Authority of India regulations.

    ISO Certification (9001:2015)

    Complete support for obtaining ISO Certification including ISO 9001:2015 and other ISO standards. We manage documentation, application process, and certification support to help demonstrate quality management, credibility, and international compliance.

    Udyam (MSME) Registration

    Assistance in obtaining Udyam MSME Registration, enabling small and medium enterprises to access government schemes, tax benefits, and financial aid. We provide documentation support, online application management, and timely approval coordination.

    03

    Why Choose Our Services

    Experience the advantage of working with compliance experts who understand business needs.

    100% Legal Compliance

    Stay fully compliant with all government regulations and avoid penalties, legal issues, or business disruptions through proper licensing and registration.

    Fast & Hassle-Free Process

    We handle all paperwork, applications, and follow-ups, saving you time and effort. Focus on your business while we manage the bureaucracy.

    Expert Guidance

    Our experienced team knows exactly what's required for each registration. We guide you through every step, ensuring accuracy and avoiding common mistakes that cause delays.

    Unlock Business Benefits

    Access government schemes, tax exemptions, subsidies, funding opportunities, and business credibility that come with proper registrations and certifications.

    04

    Why Business Registration Matters

    Understanding the importance of proper licensing and registration for your business success.

    Legal Requirement

    Many licenses are mandatory by law for operating specific types of businesses. Operating without them can lead to hefty fines, legal action, or business closure.

    Customer Trust

    Valid licenses and certifications build customer confidence in your business. They show you follow proper standards and care about quality and safety.

    Financial Benefits

    Registered businesses qualify for government subsidies, tax benefits, easier bank loans, and various financial assistance schemes unavailable to unregistered entities.

    Business Growth

    Proper registrations open doors to government tenders, corporate contracts, international trade opportunities, and partnerships with larger organizations.

    05

    Our Simple 4-Step Process

    We've streamlined the registration process to make it quick, easy, and stress-free for you.

    01

    Free Consultation

    We understand your business type and requirements to identify which licenses and registrations you need for full legal compliance.

    02

    Document Collection

    We provide a clear checklist of required documents and help you gather and organize everything needed for your applications.

    03

    Application Filing

    Our team prepares and files all applications accurately with the relevant authorities, ensuring everything is in order for approval.

    04

    Follow-up & Delivery

    We actively follow up with authorities, handle any queries, and deliver your approved licenses and certificates directly to you.

    06

    Who Needs These Services?

    Startups & New Businesses: Get your business legally registered and compliant from day one with startup registration, shop act license, and other essential permits.

    Food & Beverage Businesses: Restaurants, cafes, cloud kitchens, food manufacturers, and retailers need FSSAI food license to operate legally.

    Manufacturing & Industrial Units: Factories and manufacturing units require MPCB license for environmental compliance and pollution control.

    Import-Export Companies: Businesses trading internationally need IE Code registration for customs clearance and international transactions.

    MSMEs & Small Businesses: Small and medium enterprises benefit from Udyam registration to access government schemes, subsidies, and financial support.

    Quality-Focused Organizations: Businesses seeking to demonstrate quality management and credibility need ISO certification to compete globally.

    07

    Common Questions

    How long does the registration process take?

    Timeline varies by registration typefrom 7-15 days for simpler licenses to 30-45 days for certifications like ISO. We provide specific timelines during consultation.

    What documents do I need?

    Requirements vary by registration type, but typically include business proof, identity documents, address proof, and industry-specific documents. We provide a complete checklist.

    Can you help with renewal of existing licenses?

    Yes! We handle renewals for all types of licenses and registrations, ensuring timely renewal before expiry to avoid penalties or business interruptions.

    What if my application gets rejected?

    We ensure applications are accurate and complete to minimize rejection risk. If issues arise, we handle resubmission and corrections at no additional cost.

    Ready to Get Your Business
    Fully Compliant?

    Let us handle your registrations and licenses while you focus on growing your business
